content.html: Get ready for the world of work? Lol, find a few jobs that make you turn in your cell phone at the start of the day. Even ones that have a strictly adhered to "no cell phone usage" policy. Probably some low-end warehouse jobs, but even they are giving up. That ship has sailed.
content.value:
Get ready for the world of work?

Lol, find a few jobs that make you turn in your cell phone at the start of the day. Even ones that have a strictly adhered to "no cell phone usage" policy. Probably some low-end warehouse jobs, but even they are giving up. That ship has sailed.
